pageProps.title: Quitting Sugar benefits : 14 Days no Sugar Challange.
pageProps.metaDesc:
So, what would happen to your body if you completely stopped eating sugar? I mean, for the entire two weeks? Let's look into that.
1. Reduce your sugar cravings-
Why? Because every time you consume sugar, a hormone enters your body and lowers your blood sugars, resulting in a low blood sugar situation, or hypoglycemia to some extent. And this will cause you to crave sugar.
So, by eliminating sugar, you eliminate the desire for sugar.
2. Feeling less hungry-
Unless you do this. You won't fully understand, but I can tell you that it's the sugar that keeps you hungry all the time.
When you stop eating sugar, you become much less hungry
